txt_en: Labor is the most reliable wealth.
Sweat is the lubricant of success.
The apple doesn't fall far from the tree.
txt_cn: 树上掉下的苹果离树能有多远。

txt_en: Just hold to your dream and never give up.
txt_cn: 坚持你的梦想，永不放弃。
伟大的理想造就伟大的人。

txt_en: Speech is the image of actions.
Don't wait to be lonely to recognize the value of a friend.
txt_cn: 不要等到孤独了，才明白朋友的价值。

txt_en: I wish I could be more like you.
Whatever comes, I'll love you, just as I do now. Until I die.
txt_cn: 无论发生什么事，我都会像现在一样爱你，直到永远。

txt_en: There is always a better way.
Life is too short for us to wake up in the morning with regrets.
txt_cn: 人生苦短，所以每天不要带着遗憾醒来。

txt_en: A mother's arms are more comforting than anyone else's.
txt_cn: 妈妈的怀抱是最舒服的。——黛安娜王妃

txt_en: Inside of every problem lies an opportunity.
txt_cn: 每个问题里都藏着一个机会。

txt_en: Mankind was born on Earth. It was never meant to die here.
txt_cn: 人类生在地球， 但绝不应该在这里灭亡。——《星际穿越》

txt_en: If you are ever in trouble, don't try to be brave, just run, just run away.
txt_cn: 你若遇上麻烦，不要逞强，你就跑，远远跑开。

txt_en: Love is the one thing that transcends time and space.
Death is just a part of life, something we’re all destined to do.
txt_cn: 死亡是生命的一部分，是我们注定要面对的一件事。
